forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 14 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 20 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
True to its reputation, Downtown San Francisco greets the day under a mostly sunny sky, though not without a hint of that notorious marine layer, particularly closer to the shore. As you stand atop the hills, the sun illuminates the city’s intricate architecture, setting it aglow against the cool backdrop of a gentle breeze. The air feels crisp and invigorating, accompanied by the spirited dance of west winds that sweep through the streets. This gentle untamed energy carries the promise of a day spent in exploration, tempered by the knowledge that evening will bring a softer layer of clouds draping the skyline.

For those wishing to savor the delights of this Tuesday, a light layering will serve well; perhaps a comfortable sweater beneath a light jacket, perfect for transitioning from the warmth of the sun to the coolness of the evening. Whether indulging in a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, perusing the stalls at Ferry Plaza Farmers Market, or finding a quiet spot to relish a book in one of the many parks, the day holds a delightful array of simple joys waiting to be embraced. As the sun dips low, marking the day’s end, the coolness will deepen, inviting you to draw a little closer to warmth before the curtain of night falls.
